channel.title: meteor on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in meteor on Barefoot Rob

item.title: trying to finish the meteor course
item.description: 03:01 Friday 22 January 2016 PST (8pm JST) This is the first entry I’m writing after setting my clock back 17 hours to our new local time where clocks will indicate we landed 7.5 hours before we departed. 03:57 Well crapdogs I can’t seem to figure out how to extract data from URL via iron:router (without reading documentation (and I can’t find the code on my machine booooo)) As long as I have internet access, I wonder if I’ll get it done by Sunday (when it’s due).

item.title: meteor course on Coursera might be too easy
item.description:
11:55 Saturday 26 December 2015 JST But I enjoyed doing the first week.
https://www.coursera.org/learn/meteor-development/peer/W7bag/install-meteor-and-edit-some-templates/review/OSaUAat5EeWfHwqjLjBT9w
